name: GUNGUY (myrrialia)
description:
Created for the 3rd Lost Cartridge Game Jam
GUNGUY is a retro platformer meant to replicate a game for the SNES

Developers:
Nicky Argiropoulos
Yan Lun Chan
Simon Choquet

Controls
Mouse and Keyboard:
Move - WAS
Crouch - D
Attack - LMB
Jump - Space
Sprint - Shift
"Press Start" - Enter
Exit Game - Alt+F4

Controller: 
Move & Crouch - D-Pad
Attack - X
Jump - A
Sprint - B
